ADVERTS: Want to know the available commands? Type <orange>/help<end>.
Type <orange>/map<end> for the server map link.
See where you are on the server map at: <lime>http://http://map.playrust.io/?104.46.99.115:28015<end>

MESSAGES.ADMINS LIST DESC: <orange>/admins<end> <grey>-<end> List of online <cyan>Admins<end> in the server.
MESSAGES.ADVERTS DESC: <orange>/adverts<end> <grey>-<end> Allows <cyan>Admins<end> to change the adverts interval ( i.g: /adverts 5 )
MESSAGES.CHECK CONSOLE: Check the console (press F1) for more info.
MESSAGES.MAP LINK: See where you are on the server map at: <lime>http://gameserver-25u.cloudapp.net:28015<end>
MESSAGES.NO LANG: Error, <lime>{args}<end> language not supported or does not exist.
MESSAGES.NO RULES: Error, no rules found, contact the <cyan>Admins<end>.
MESSAGES.PLAYERS LIST DESC: <orange>/players<end> <grey>-<end> List of all players in the server.
MESSAGES.PLAYERS ONLINE DESC: <orange>/online<end> <grey>-<end> Shows the number of players and <cyan>Admins<end> online, plus a few server stats.
MESSAGES.PLUGINS LIST DESC: <orange>/plugins<end> <grey>-<end> List of plugins installed in the server.

DE: Spiel fair und missbrauche keine Bugs oder Exploits.
DK: Play fair og ikke misbruger af bugs / exploits.

Juega limpio y no abuses de bugs/exploits.
